info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN MORA AND SOUTH CENTRAL COLFAX COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM MDT... At 427 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wagon Mound, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 382 and 402. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
